title: `se` with Three-Place Predicates
goal: Master `se` conversion with `tavla`, `cusku`, and other three-place gismu.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

New vocabulary review:

1. own   → ?
2. carry → ?
3. move  → ?

(Answers: ponse, bevri, muvdu)

Convert: mi ponse la skami → ?

(Answer: la skami se ponse mi)

New Material (5-7 min)

Deep Dive: se with Three-Place Gismu

do se tavla mi la cukta — You are talked to by me about the book.

When se swaps x1 and x2 in a three-place gismu, the result can feel like English passive voice.

tavla Analysis

Version x1 x2 x3
tavla talker listener topic
se tavla listener talker topic

Examples:

Normal With se
mi tavla do la cukta do se tavla mi la cukta
I talk to you about the book. You are talked to by me about the book.
Normal With se
la .bob. cu tavla la .alis. la karce la .alis. se tavla la .bob. la karce
Bob talks to Alice about the car. Alice is talked to by Bob about the car.

cusku Analysis

Version x1 x2 x3
cusku speaker statement audience
se cusku statement speaker audience

Examples:

Normal With se
mi cusku ti do ti se cusku mi do
I say this to you. This is said by me to you.

When se is Natural

Answering questions about the listener:

  • Q: "Who is talked to about the book?"
  • A: la .alis. se tavla la .bob. la cukta — Alice is talked to by Bob about the book.

Maintaining topic continuity:

la .alis. se tavla mi la cukta .i la .alis. cu gleki

(Alice is talked to by me about the book. Alice is happy.)

Multiple se Examples

Normal With se
mi benji la cukta la .bob. la cukta se benji mi la .bob.
la .alis. cu dunda la plise mi la plise se dunda la .alis. mi
do lebna la stizu la .tam. la stizu se lebna do la .tam.

Key Point

With three-place gismu, se makes the original x2 (listener, statement, gift) the new topic in x1 position.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Convert to se

  1. mi tavla la .bob. la skami → ?
  2. la .alis. cu cusku ti mi → ?
  3. do lebna la cukta la .tam. → ?
  4. la .meris. cu benji la karce la .bob. → ?
  5. mi tavla do la zarci → ?
Answers
  1. la .bob. se tavla mi la skami
  2. ti se cusku la .alis. mi
  3. la cukta se lebna do la .tam.
  4. la karce se benji la .meris. la .bob.
  5. do se tavla mi la zarci

Exercise 2: Convert from se

  1. la .alis. se tavla la .bob. la cukta → ?
  2. ta se cusku mi do → ?
  3. la skami se benji la .tam. la .alis. → ?
Answers
  1. la .bob. cu tavla la .alis. la cukta
  2. mi cusku ta do
  3. la .tam. cu benji la skami la .alis.

Exercise 3: Create Continuous Topic Sentences

Write two sentences where the topic stays the same using se:

Example:

la .alis. se tavla mi la cukta .i la .alis. cu gleki
Example answers
  1. la cukta se dunda mi la .bob. .i la cukta cu melbi
  2. la karce se benji la .alis. mi .i la karce cu barda
  3. la .bob. se tavla mi la zarci .i la .bob. cu klama la zarci

Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "Alice is talked to by me." → la .alis. se tavla mi
  2. "This is said by Bob to you." → ti se cusku la .bob. do
  3. "The book is taken from Tom by me." → la cukta se lebna mi la .tam.

Today's Vocab

No new gismu — focus on se mastery with three-place predicates.

Pattern summary:

Gismu se Effect
tavla listener becomes x1
cusku statement becomes x1
benji thing sent becomes x1
lebna thing taken becomes x1
dunda gift becomes x1

Summary

You mastered se with three-place gismu. The original x2 (listener, statement, gift, etc.) moves to x1 position, becoming the topic.

Tomorrow preview: You'll learn pleji (pay), canja (exchange), and ralte (keep), then practice choosing when se makes sentences more natural.
